name: AbdomenCTWithContrast
title: Abdomen CT with contrast
description:
This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen CTâ€”Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. Patients are eligible for inclusion in the OP-10 measure denominator if their provider performs an abdomen/abdominopelvic CT without contrast, with contrast, or without then with contrast. Patients are eligible for inclusion in the OP-10 measure numerator if their provider performs an abdomen/abdominopelvic CT with contrast.
Please reference the OP-10 annual reevaluation report for more details on the measure's denominator, numerator, and exclusion criteria.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains CPT codes associated with Abdomen CT with contrast.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with Abdomen CT with contrast.),(Inclusion Criteria: CPT codes associated with Abdomen CT with contrast are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with Abdomen CT with contrast with contrast are excluded from this value set. Codes captured in systems other than CPT are also excluded from the value set.)
